rules_text:
{B}{B}: Moor Specter gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only if you gained life this turn.
When Moor Specter dies, if it was tapped, each opponent discards two cards.
flavor_text:
[i]Three that eve fled to the dock
Two sought freedom in the Loch
One escaped into the fen
None were ever seen again[/i]
